myopenmath.statement:
A coffee distributor plans to mix some Arabian Mocha coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${13.50} per pound with some Kenya coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${14.80} per pound to create \displaystyle{20} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${14.61} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound. pounds of Arabian Mocha coffee. pounds of Kenya coffee.
